purpose: To serve as a curated collection of resources related to foundation agents, facilitating research and development in this domain
principle: Aggregates resources and information relevant to the study and development of foundation agents
reusability: Can be used as a reference for researchers and developers interested in foundation agents; provides links to various resources
limitations: Primarily a static collection of links and resources without direct integration or API support
name: awesome-foundation-agents
description: About Awesome things towards foundation agents. Papers / Repos / Blogs / ...
highlight: Comprehensive resource repository for foundation agents, including papers, repositories, and blogs
